code:
sequenceDiagram participant VThread_A as "Thread Executora da Tarefa
(Education_ClassroomService)" participant TaskExecutorService as "TaskExecutorService" participant EventPublisher as "EventPublisher" participant SharedExecutor as "Executor Partilhado
(Education_LMS_Portal)" VThread_A ->>+ TaskExecutorService: executeSynchronousBlock(Education_GradeSync) loop "Ciclo de Execução Síncrona" Note over TaskExecutorService: Executa a lógica do Nó N... TaskExecutorService ->> TaskExecutorService: Acumula Evento (Education_ClassroomService) end Note right of TaskExecutorService: O ciclo termina ao encontrar um ponto de commit. TaskExecutorService ->>+ EventPublisher: publishEvents(Education_StudentDB) Note right of EventPublisher: A thread principal NÃO espera. par "Notificação Assíncrona dos Listeners com Lote de Eventos" EventPublisher ->> SharedExecutor: submit(Education_LMS_Portal)) and EventPublisher ->> SharedExecutor: submit(Education_ClassroomService)) end EventPublisher -->>- TaskExecutorService: Retorna Imediatamente TaskExecutorService -->>- VThread_A: Retorna VThread_A ->> VThread_A: Continua para o próximo passo (Education_GradeSync) Note over SharedExecutor: Os listeners agora podem otimizar o seu trabalho
(Education_GradeSync).

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:

(Education_ClassroomService)"是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:

(Education_LMS_Portal)"？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
